Pandas :- 
--> Pandas is a data analysis library which uses the power of numpy
--> Pandas library is developed by using CPython
--> Pandas library deals with .csv files


Data structure in Pandas :- Two types
1) series (1D array) :- Series is nothing but like one dimensional array
2) DataFrame (2D array) :- DataFrame is just like two dimensional array

matplotib library :- the matplotlib library is a data visualization library . It is used make two dimensional plots/


import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
x = [1,2,3]
y = [4,5,1]

plt.plot(x,y)

plt.show()
